Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12 (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

AskToDeleteMail Gives the Opportunity to Show the Confirmation Popup Before Deleting Mails in your iOS Stock Mail Application!

The Tweak Therefore Asks for the Confirm When Taping on the Delete Button for Preventing this Action by Mistake.

You can Also Launch with Ease the Mail Application inside the Preferences of AskToDeleteMail.

Configure options from Settings.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.
